name: spillway
content:
Add to word list
Add to word list
a passage for extra water from a lake created by a dam (= a wall built across a river to hold back water): The dam had water pouring over one of its spillways. The emergency spillway is not properly designed.
More examplesFewer examplesThe owners of the dam did not fix the spillway.The dam's main spillway isn't large enough to pass a lot of water in a big storm.More water is needed to flush young salmon through dam spillways.
